Interface IMessageReceiver

The room level connection for Chatapp; every user has one IMessageReceiver per room they are in.

Implements
Remote
Namespace:
Assembly: .dll
Syntax
public interface IMessageReceiver extends Remote

Methods

receiveMessage(RoomDataPacket<? extends IRoomMessage> data)

When an IMessageReceiver receives a data packet.
